basic.description: A field-based course stressing methods used in geological engineering site investigation.  Includes field characterization of engineering properties and behaviour of earth materials and their structures.  Student teams conduct eight site investigations that address geological engineering problems.  Two of these involve the design of an infrastructure improvement project, with geological considerations. Results are presented in weekly engineering reports illustrated with maps and sections. (0/14/0/26/14)
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Geological Engr Field Methods

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
